items.value: Bob needs a Blue Cow, quickly!
If you bring me a Blue Cow i will give you a good Gift..

Hey Buddy,
i am tired and would like to drink a Blue Cow!
Could you may get me one?

I will give you the Money after it!
You may get it within the Metro...

Bob need:
1x Blue Cow
Err... what is a Blue Cow?
sure, i have one in my Inventory!
i am currently busy, may later!

Uhm...
it is a good and common Energy Drink!
May check a Store or the Metro Vendors to get one!
Oh... ok! I will get you one...

Yummi how delicious!
Thank you that's really nice.

I give you these wallets that I found in other people's pants. ;)
By the way: a Blue Cow makes you faster!

You got: 2x filled Wallet
good to know... see you Bob!

You dont have a Blue Cow :(
please come back as soon you got one...
